Text.Page: So I'm looking for necrotic badges. No, you don't want to know why, but I'm offering a valuable consideration in return.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What, exactly?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Duality badges. Great trade, huh? I knew you'd agree, because you're smart. Like me.

Just bring the necrotic badges when you have them. We'll do business.

There you are, ready to deal! I'll take my badges, and here are yours.

Come back any time!

I think it's best to hold off on our transaction until you find more necrotic badges.

I wouldn't take my time if I were you, though. I won't have any need for more badges once my order is filled.
